_comment: Example Development Configuration for Honua Server
_comment2: Copy this to appsettings.Development.json and customize for your local environment
_comment3: appsettings.Development.json is in .gitignore and will not be committed

authentication._comment: For development only - use Local or Jwt for production

odata._comment: Allow writes in development for testing

cors._comment: Permissive CORS for development - restrict in production

ConnectionStrings._comment: Use environment variables or appsettings.Development.json for actual connection strings

logging._comment: Use simple console logging for development

RateLimiting._comment: Disable rate limiting for easier development
